description: Kids tired of sandwiches? Add a twist! These healthier egg and lettuce pinwheels are a fun addition to any lunch box. Give this easy lunch recipe a spin.
keywords: Kids wrap,Grape,Pescatarian,Halal,Seafood free,Vegetarian,Egg,Healthier Easier,Back to school
name: Egg And Lettuce Pinwheel Lunch Box Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 6 thin slices Woolworths high fibre low GI bread

recipeInstructions.text: Bring a medium saucepan of water to the boil. Add eggs and cook for 7 minutes then, using a slotted spoon, instantly plunge into iced water to cool. Peel eggs, then mash. Season with pepper.
Remove and discard crusts from bread, then roll with a rolling pin until as thin as possible. Divide egg and lettuce evenly between bread slices, then roll up tightly and pinch to seal.
Place pinwheels in lunch boxes along with celery, carrot, yoghurt and grapes.
